entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 1 May 2023
